snippet.title: Fortnite Chapter 2 - Season 1 | Battle Pass Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
More Fun, Less Grind. Check out the brand new Chapter 2 - Season 1 Battle Pass.  Fortnite.com/Battle-Pass 

Fortnite Chapter 2 - Season 1 is here and there are plenty of new things to discover in the new Battle Pass featuring a brand new XP system and Medals you earn in match. Pick up the Battle Pass with over 100 exclusive rewards for 950 V-Bucks. Plus, by leveling up your Battle Pass you can earn up to 1500 V-Bucks to spend in the shop. This season, get the Turk and Journey Outfits instantly when you purchase the Battle Pass. 

Play Fortnite Battle Royale, the completely free 100-player PvP mode. One giant map, A Battle Bus, Last one standing wins. ESRB Rating: Teen with Violence.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fortnite/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FortniteGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FortniteGame/

Learn More: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/en-US/
